title: my account is hacked
body:
my old account was hacked, I do not know how, but I remember someone sent me friends there is a link that said free skins and 2000 rp, and I right clicked on the link and wanted me username and password, wrote me everything and now I to get your account, I can tell you all about the account has a password skins characters inside, please help me
skype address: [REDACTED]
thank you :)

replies.body:
In order to get this resolved, you'll need to [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our Account Specialists. Select the category "I need help recovering my account" and fill out as much info as you can to assist in your recovery. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
You should send in a ticket to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us), and work through their instructions to recover your account.
